meanings.definition: By means of this act or document.
meanings.sent1: I hereby declare the meeting adjourned.
meanings.sent2: You can hereby sign the contract to make it official.
meanings.sent3: The magician hereby pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The key to success is hereby unlocking your potential.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them to a chest filled with gold, hereby proving its authenticity.

meanings.definition: As a result of this action.
meanings.sent1: She passed the exam, hereby proving her knowledge.
meanings.sent2: The storm caused damage to the house, hereby requiring repairs.
meanings.sent3: The chef burned the dish, hereby creating a new recipe.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner crossed the finish line, hereby achieving his goal.
meanings.sent5: The invention revolutionized the industry, hereby changing the way we live.
